assistance.title: Continuous Assistance
assistance.description: Continuous assistance is an integral part of my approach aimed at treating the whole body, not just the isolated problem. This service is essential to ensuring my patients' long-term health and well-being.

therapy.title: Treatment and Therapy
therapy.description: I strive to understand the root of your problem to provide you with the most effective treatment. Over the years, I have found that treatment and therapy are fundamental elements in the recovery process.

health.title: Assessment and Diagnosis
health.description: I listen to your story and create a detailed file. I then develop a personalized treatment plan that includes assessment and diagnosis, aimed at achieving the functional results we have set together.
